channel.title: Abhishek Shree
channel.description: I am an undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur. Also I try to blog about the amazing stuff I come across.

item.title: TIL - Binaries are weird
item.description: Wanted to know why are binaries for the same program of variable size and what optimizations follow.
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)

item.title: Don't like Rust? Use some CLI tools written in it once
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)

item.title: ROS - A Primer
item.description: Discussed the essentials of ROS for a smoother learning curve.
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)

item.title: TIL - How to tranfer storage space between Operating Systems
item.description: How to move X space to some Y place on disk, and vice versa.
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)
